vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to hear, be attentive, heed, incline (of ears), attend (of ears), hearken, pay attention, listen
1a) (Qal) incline, attend (of ears), hearken, pay attention, listen
1b) (Hiphil) to pay attention, give attention
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   prestar atención; (b) hif.   atender a
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 聽見, 留意, 注意到, 傾聽, 專注,
1a) (Qal) 傾聽, 專注, 專心
1b) (Hiphil) 留心, 使之注意
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 听见, 留意, 注意到, 倾听, 专注,
1a) (Qal) 倾听, 专注, 专心
1b) (Hiphil) 留心, 使之注意
